system.special: SM Wep, Power Field, Sanctified, Unwieldy
system.note:
Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Power Fist of the White Consuls Chapter. Does +2 damage against Mutants. 
Increases Unnatural Strength from x2 to x3 for damage purposes as with all Power Fists.
